1.description: I idolize a particular hero of my faith, and constantly refer to that person’s deeds and example.

2.description: I can find common ground between the fiercest enemies, empathizing with them and always working toward peace.

3.description: I see omens in every event and action. The gods try to speak to us, we just need to listen.

4.description: Nothing can shake my optimistic attitude.

5.description: I quote (or misquote) sacred texts and proverbs in almost every situation.

6.description: I am tolerant (or intolerant) of other faiths and respect (or condemn) the worship of other gods.

7.description: I’ve enjoyed fine food, drink, and high society among my temple’s elite. Rough living grates on me.

8.description: I’ve spent so long in the temple that I have little practical experience dealing with people in the outside world.
